name: Reptile Nemesis
description:
Reptile Nemesis is a straightforward 2D platformer created on 72h gamejam by a team of two people.

You are an anthropomorphic reptiloid, the victim of gruesome research and a drunken midwife trying to get out of a lab of screwed-up cultists. The consequence of the experiments on you is the ability to... Control weapons? No, not only that. Killing makes you stronger. And this device implanted in your back...

Play the game over and over again and you'll be able to choose from 10+ perks to try out different tactics. Want to get fast, bouncy and bombproof? Or maybe you want to play the game with double damage, fast reloads and wall-bouncing bullets to boot? It's up to you.

* 8 different weapons
* 15 different perks
* 7 levels
* Three sleepless nights of lost sanity
* 7 enemies and 1 boss
* A joke in the main menu instead of an art
